name: PII Redaction & Data Loss Prevention Pipeline
description: Automatic detection and redaction/pseudonymization of PII before data leaves the secure boundary or is processed by external services.

banned_tools: Sending raw data to third-party APIs pre-redaction

llm_insights: Policy-as-code enables consistent enforcement across services.
Tokenization preserves analytics utility without exposing PII.
llm_challenges: Entity boundary errors in noisy text.
llm_recommended_approach: Insert a gateway service that enforces redaction via Presidio and OPA before any external call; monitor with audit logs and sampling.
